this more v s please pattern is copyright 2018 by melinda miller per copyright law do not redistribute with or without charge in any form without express written permission redistributing to others includes by photocopies scanning emailing putting on a cd posting in internet forum messages putting on another web site and any other manner of distribution page 1 skill level easy finished size 12 square materials worsted weight yarn crochet hook size i / 5 5 mm tapestry needle note pattern is written for color changes on almost every round and is a great scrap buster change colors at your own discretion abbreviations beg = beginning round = round chain/s = chain/s single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet= double_crochet skip = skip/skipped fc = first color slip_stitch = slip_stitch half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet space/s = space/s hk = hook st/s = stitch/es nc = new color treble_crochet = treble_crochet special stitches begcorner v-st chain 4 counts as double_crochet chain 1 work 1 double_crochet chain 1 v-st in same st/space corner v-st v-st chain 1 v-st in same st/space shell 7 double_crochet in same space v-st 1 double_crochet chain 1 1 double_crochet in indicated st/space © 2018 melinda miller all rights reserved more v s please copyright - this more v s please pattern is copyright 2018 by melinda miller per copyright law do not redistribute with or without charge in any form without express written permission redistributing to others includes by photocopies scanning emailing putting on a cd posting in internet forum messages putting on another web site and any other manner of distribution page 2 instructions round 1 with fc chain 4 join with slip_stitch to form a ring or work a magic_ring chain 1 does not count as a stitch 8 half_double_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch to beg half_double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 1 does not count as a st 2 half_double_crochet in same and each st around join with slip_stitch to beg half_double_crochet finish off 16 half_double_crochet round 3 join nc with slip_stitch to any half_double_crochet chain 5 counts as double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in same st chain 1 skip next st double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in next st chain 1 skip next st around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-5 finish off 16 double_crochet 8 chain-2 8 chain-1 round 4 join nc with slip_stitch to any chain-2 space chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in same space chain 1 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 1 around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 finish off 32 double_crochet 8 chain-2 8 chain-1 round 5 join nc with single_crochet to any chain-1 space shell in next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-1 space shell in next chain-2 space around join
